function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lockdown and closure of public green spaces by the polish government in response to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Belief in the necessity of access to green spaces for mental health and well-being during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoidance of green spaces during different phases of the covid-19 pandemic indicates concerns about disease transmission and may lead to reduced outdoor activity and social isolation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compliance with governmental mobility restrictions leading to reduced visits to green spaces.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of infection leading to reduced visits to green spaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of free time as a reason for reduced visits to green spaces.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Governmental regulation banning the use of green spaces during the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial analyses based solely on vector data models may limit the understanding of contagious disease spread through other data types such as raster models or network data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting an online survey may lead to a biased sample composition, potentially skewing the data analysis and conclusions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Preference for online questionnaires among younger respondents may result in overrepresentation of this age group in the survey data, leading to age bias in the analysis and conclusions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of questionnaire for data collection during a pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial analysis and gis methods for studying green spaces during a pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on gis and big data technologies for covid-19 response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Survey data collection lacking identifying information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Broad promotion of the survey","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encouraging the use of private channels for survey participation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting an online survey due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of online surveys for data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Residents of krakow may have been exposed to a higher risk of contagious diseases due to increased visitation to urban green spaces during the pandemic.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness or education about safe practices in urban green spaces during the pandemic could lead to higher exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in proportion of public green spaces in urban areas","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lifestyle changes due to the pandemic leading to longer socio-psychological and behavioral implications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequalities in access to green spaces and their impact on health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented lockdown and mobility restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compulsory mouth and nose covering","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Phases of pandemic and government actions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shut down of public spaces","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enforcement of specific restrictions and regulations","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Public behavioral responses to media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Loss of trust in official governmental media","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Gender and age differences in embracing protective behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-representative online survey sample","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on official governmental media as the primary source of information","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trust in the source of information as a predictor of protective behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dissemination of outdated or wrong health information through social predictor of protective behaviors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High risk perception not always associated with high preparedness for natural
